overview: This short film, is about the winding road of choices and how one road may lead to new beginnings. With a relationship that seems to have no resolution, a opportunity for reconciliation, leads to a totally different road of redemption. This is what happens when two different lives take a "DETOUR". Using drama, humor and romance, this film shows that everyone's life, takes turns that lead to the unexpected, possibly giving you a chance to make things right.  - Written by Nan Lin
title: Detour
